title: Hardware Design Development Training
description: Mindmajix Hardware Design Development Training makes you an expert in using a Microcontroller Surge protection circuits, EMI/EMC protection, Interfacings, Current source, Amplifiers, Opamps, Logic Gates, Flip flops, and Counters ….etc
instructor_bio: Giridhar has got 25+ years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.
review|1|review: Loved the way it is delivered. Clear and precise so much so that you can just refer the course for starting a project.I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to start a career in Hardware Design Development. Cheers!!!
review|2|review: As a beginner, I found the Hardware Design Development course curriculum and explanation well defined. It is simple and easy to learn new and complex technologies. Simple but powerful and informative modules. Great way to start learning.. Well done Mindmajix Team.
review|3|review: As a beginner, I found simple and easy to learn new and complex technologies with Mindmajix Training Methodology. Great way to start learning.. Thanks a lot.
review|4|review: I took Hardware Deign Development Coaching from MindMajix, the Trainer is very experienced and is very friendly with us. He cleared all our Doubts with detail and easy explanations. I suggest others to choose MindMajix IT Training.
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified Hardware Design Development Professionals

title: Firmware Development Training
description: Mindmajix Firmware Development training makes you an expert in building the applications by leveraging capabilities of Hardware storage methods, Bit operations, Pointers, Testing of modules, Test drivers, test stubs, Function overloading., etc. Enroll & Become Certified.
review|1|review: The training on Firmware Development by mindmajix checks all the right boxes. The course material was very detailed and oriented towards equipping me with practical skills rather than bookish knowledge. Thanks to Mindmajix team
review|2|review: Thanks for making this platform available. Provided best Firmware Development training. I hope to bring more people to embrace mindmajix as the bridge to filling the gaps in their career needs.
review|3|review: Firmware Development Training at MindMajix was extensive. It was well planned and well executed. The trainer as well versed with the technology. Overall a good experience.
content: ['What is Firmware?', 'Architectures', 'What is RISC and CISC?', 'Microprocessors and microcontrollers back then and now', 'Wired Protocols', 'Wireless Protocols', 'Knowledge of wireless industry standards with preference to including IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax', 'JTAG and USB ASP', 'DSP Assembly Programming', 'Introduction to RTOS and FreeRTOS', 'What are PLA, PAL, FPGA?', 'Types of Memories', 'What is Cache memory?', 'What is pipelining?', 'Introduction to ARM TrustZone and Secure OS like', 'Comprehensions of', 'Arduino and AVR', 'Experience working with (Git, Subversion)', 'Introduction to AVR Studio', 'Introduction to firmware development and testing tools', 'PIC Mircrocontrollers', 'ARM Microprocessor', 'IOT', 'Interview Questions and Answers']
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified Firmware Development Professionals
